messages.content: Hello! How can I help you today?
when should I use a raincoat as opposed to an umbrella?

An umbrella is a really good way to keep you dry, but you’ll need to use it in cold weather, because of its waterproof material. A raincoat, on the other hand, is usually used in warm weather, because it’s waterproof and breathable. It’s up to you whether you want to use an umbrella or raincoat in your travels.
